product.title: Let's Go Buffalo Pennant (Blue and Red)
product.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. To celebrate the Buffalo Bills 2020 AFC East Division title and playoff run, we've updated our classic "Let's Go Buffalo" pennant. This special, limited edition design in official Bills colors matches our 40-foot pennants flying high at the top of Seneca One in Downtown Buffalo. If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. Size: 9" x 27" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Blue
product.descriptionHtml:
Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. To celebrate the Buffalo Bills 2020 AFC East Division title and playoff run, we've updated our classic "Let's Go Buffalo" pennant. This special, limited edition design in official Bills colors matches our 40-foot pennants flying high at the top of Seneca One in Downtown Buffalo.


If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. 

Size: 9" x 27"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design

Color: Blue
